body.p: Mikhail among the Americans called Michael Berg, is at the present time in China and calls himself Jacob Borodin. Mikhail Gruzonberg was a person with little In America he did not experience much suffering and need. While at the Valparaiso did not distinguish himself in any way. Coming to Chicago he tried the field of teaching. He opened a school of English and turned it later to a preparatory school, which, nevertheless, was not recognized. When Russia was struck by the revolution, Gruzenberg agitated against Bolshevik impudence, cursed, called them bandits and usurpers, and other sweet names. But the reader should not believe much in his sincerity.

Gruzenberg was aggravated that he could not benefit from the situation, but when he realized how the Bolsheviks had overpowered the Russian people, he changed his tactics and through certain tricks became an official of the Foreign Office in Moscow. Here be found ground to
distinguish himself in the of Bolshevism.

And this was just in his line. The bolsheviks value such individuals and offered to conduct their intrigues among the Chinese Cantonese revolutionists. It is that during the time decleard himself to be the Societ representative Borodin in China, the commandant of the ordered that the of the Bolshevik agitators be shut.
One does not have to be a prophet to foretell that in the near future we shall see some of the good friends of Gruzenberg - Borodin appear on the Bolshevik horizon.
